member.summary: The InstitutionId of the Canadian Bank. If a US bank, this attribute will be null

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount
member.summary: This object is obsolete as of API 1.16 for security reasons

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount.RoutingId
member.summary: The Routing Id of bank, if it's a United States Bank. The routing Id is 9 digits in length and can be verified as "valid" by using a checksum algorithm - a quick internet search will reveal this algorithm. Any adds or updates will be rejected if the routing id is invalid.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount.InstitutionId
member.summary: The Institution Id of the bank, if it's a Canadian Bank. Unlike the routing Id, there's no checksum algorithm, but the Institution Id must be 3 characters long. Any adds or updates will be rejected if the Institution Id does not meet this criterion.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount.BranchNumber
member.summary: The Branch Number of the bank, if it's a Canadian Bank. The Branch Number must be 5 characters long. Any adds or updates will be rejected if the Branch Number does not meet this criterion.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount.BankName
member.summary: The official name of the bank

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount.AccountId
member.summary: The Account Id of the bank account

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.BankAccount.Nickname
member.summary: The user defined nickname of the account. The length of the nickname is restricted to 50 characters.

member.summary: The type of the account

member.summary: This is the ID of the person.

member.summary: This is the name of the person.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.EmergencyInformation.EmergencyContacts
member.summary: This is the information about one point of contact for a person, which could be someone to contact in case of emergency or someone to notify if the person is missing (or both). It includes the contact's name, phone numbers, relationship, effective date, and indicators of whether to contact for an emergency or if missing.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.EmergencyInformation.InsuranceInformation
member.summary: Free-form text information about a person's insurance. This can be multi-line, where the user has formatted it similarly to what appears on the insurance card. Line breaks will be maintained as entered by the user (as much as possible). Each line is expected to be 40 characters or less. Any line that exceeds 40 characters will be broken into multiple lines of 40 characters or less.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.EmergencyInformation.HospitalPreference
member.summary: Free-form text information about a person's hospital preference. Maximum length is 50 characters.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.EmergencyInformation.AdditionalInformation
member.summary: Free-form text containing self-disclosed additional information that would be needed in case of emergency. This can be multi-line, and the line breaks will be maintained as entered by the user (as much as possible). Each line of text is expected to be 74 characters or less. Any line that exceeds 74 characters will be broken into multiple lines of 74 characters or less.

member.summary: The list of deposit directives for this account

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective
member.summary: A PayableDepositDirective directs how and when the AccountsPayable or EChecks system should deposit money to a PayableDepositAccount

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.Id
member.summary: The unique system-generated id of this PayableDepositDirective

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.PayeeId
member.summary: The unique Id of the payee, either a Person or an Organization associated with this PayableDepositDirective

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.RoutingId
member.summary: The Routing Id of the bank associated with this PayableDepositDirective, if it's a United States Bank. The routing Id is 9 digits in length and can be verified as "valid" by using a checksum algorithm - a quick internet search will reveal this algorithm. Any adds or updates will be rejected if the routing id is invalid.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.InstitutionId
member.summary: The Institution Id of the bank associated with this PayableDepositDirective, if it's a Canadian Bank. Unlike the routing Id, there's no checksum algorithm, but the InstitutionId must be 3 characters long. Any adds or updates will be rejected if the Institution Id does not meet this criterion.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.BranchNumber
member.summary: The Branch Number of the bank associated with this PayableDepositDirective, if it's a Canadian Bank. The Branch Number must be 5 characters long. Any adds or updates will be rejected if the Branch Number does not meet this criterion.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.BankName
member.summary: The official name of the bank associated with this PayableDepositDirective

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.BankAccountType
member.summary: The type of the bank account associated with this PayableDepositDirective

member.summary: The Bank Account Id of a new PayableDepositDirective or an updated Bank Account Id of an existing but unverified PayableDepositDirective.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.AccountIdLastFour
member.summary: The Last four characters of Bank Account Id of a new PayableDepositDirective or an updated Bank Account Id of an existing but unverified PayableDepositDirective.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.Base.PayableDepositDirective.Nickname
member.summary: The user defined nickname of the bank account associated with this PayableDepositDirective. The length of the nickname is restricted to 50 characters.

member.summary: Indicates whether this bank account has been verified by the business office. "Verified" is also known as "prenoted" in back-office parlance.

member.summary: The AddressId of the payable deposit directives. For employees this value should be null. For Vendors this property can have a value.

member.summary: The id of the Payable Deposit Directive to authenticate against. If obtaining authentication for a new employee or new vendor, this attribute can be null. If the current user already has deposit directives for the given addressId, this attribute cannot be null.
